question:
Your friend is involved in an import/export business. You have some ideas that might be helpful. Write to him/her and say

– Suggest a product and explain what is good about it.
– Tell him/her about the product in your country.
– Advise what he/she should do with this product.
text: I hope you are doing good. It has been a long time since we talked to each other. Nevertheless, I heard about your new import/export trade. I felt very delighted about your business and I wanted to share a few ideas that might be helpful to you.

First of all, I would like to tell you about a product which will be a great option for import/export business, which is, Himalayan apples, grown in northern hilly areas of the county. These apples are grown only in a few specific regions and hence very rare to find. They are very bright red in colour and also very sweet in taste. In our country, these Himalayan apples are sold at a very high price because of low supply and high demand. Also, during the offseason, there is even more hike in its price.
So, you can also export them to other countries and earn a good profit. You will not regret choosing this product for your business.
Give my love to your family and children. Hope to catch up with you soon.
